name: WELFARE WORLD
briefDescription: Welfare World has been working in the community development sector since a long period. During this span, it has undergone many alternation, modification in its organizational development, exercise and its outlook towards the sector and the people it is working for. Planned approach to development with the active participation and involvement of the concerned people at all levels stands out as the main aim of Agency. Achieving socio-economic development through various welfare activities have been the objectives.
